home.bannerContent01: Seed NFT serves as a citizenship proof within the SeeDAO network polis and is a prerequisite to obtain governance rights.
home.bannerContent02: Every Seed NFT is an unique seed, capturing your personal imprint on our shared SeeDAO journey.
home.dynamicContent: The Tai Chi Star on the character's forehead in the Seed NFT will dynamically change based on the points in the member's wallet, affecting all on-chain avatars. It reflects the current holder's level and updates when trading actions occur with a new owner.
home.dynamicPolaris: Tai Chi Star colors for different points/Level:
home.avatarDesc: The Seed NFT serves as avatar in SeeDAO. It offers a visual profile picture (PFP), and portrays memberâ€™s reputation score reflected by colour of the Tai Chi Star.
home.governanceDesc: The Seed NFT is a prerequisite for participating in our Node Consensus Conference and obtaining internal governance rights within the community.
home.incubationDesc: Seed NFT holder is able to initiate any one of the three level DAO proposals to receive financial support from the SeeDAO Community Fund.
home.rewardsDesc: In an event of third party partnership benefits or tokens issued by SeeDAO will be based on the holdings of Seed NFT as the basis for airdrops.
home.howToObtain: How to Obtain a Seed NFT
home.powMintDesc:
Earn 50,000 points to unlock 
 minting in SeeDAO.

gallery.emptyResult: Sorry, we couldn't find a Seed NFT that matches your search criteria.
